name: APSVIZ ADCIRC Prediction System
description: Coastal hazards prediction system built around the ADCIRC coastal circulation and storm surge model. Provides coastal water level, wave, and inundation forecasts for the US East and Gulf coasts, updated four times daily using meteorological forecasts from the Global Forecast System. Additional forecasts provided during tropical events. Model results available via APSViz webportal and data products upon request.
owner_name: Center for Natural Hazards Resilience, Renaissance Computing Institute, The Water Institute

geotopics.description: Storm surge, coastal water level, wave, and inundation forecasts
